tool.name: OGS: convertGEO
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'convertGEO'.
tool.command: convertGEO #for $f in $input_file: --input-file '$f' #end for #for $f in $gmsh_path: --gmsh-path '$f' #end for --output-file output_1.dat

param.name: input_file
param.label: input file
param.help: Input (.gml|.gli). The name of the geometry file to be converted

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: Input (.msh). The path to the gmsh binary file

tool.help: This tool runs the **convertGEO** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
